è‹±æ–‡æ•˜è¿°æ­¡è¿æ”¹å‹•

Hong Kong police ordered immediate closure of Prince Edward metro station and dispersed reporters and paramedics after attacking passengers indiscriminately on 31 Aug. Three seriously wounded passengers have gone missing since the same day.

The metro station reopened on 2 Sep. Requests to disclose CCTV footage were denied. The three missing passengers have not yet been found.

Three fatal cases were revealed within the same day on 3 Sep.
